description:
Now has favorites!  Keep track of as many dates as you want by giving each date event a unique name.
Calql8 Dates allows you to specify a beginning or ending date as well as Days, Weekdays, Weekend Days, Weeks, Months, and Years.  Lock in the duration you care about and the information will stay current.  You can customize what durations are displayed for each date event you are tracking as well as the order they are displayed independently. 
In addition to keeping track of dates, Calql8 Dates tells you the day of the week the starting and ending dates fall on.  This information can be used to determine what day of the week a person was born on, what day of the week Christmas falls on, or what day of the week a holiday will occur.
Just a few of the uses for Calql8 Dates:
*Calculate how many days old a person is
*Calculate the due date for a pregnancy and countdown the days until the due date
*Calculate the number of working days for a project
*Accounting
*School scheduling
*Vacation planning
*Project planning
*Estimation
*Shipment arrival dates
*And many more...
